author: jsdelfino
msg: Added composite-impl sample to the build. Callbacks are currently not injected properly, so added a FIXME comment to the code that handles the callback in the sample.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Added handling of composite references that use the SCA default binding. For now translate these references to wires on the promoted references in the inner composites.
